nodes.text: Keldabe was the former capital city of the planet Mandalore. Around 42 BBY, the city was devastated during the Mandalorian Civil War, a year-long conflict fought between the New Mandalorian peace movement and Mandalore's martial traditionalists. When the New Mandalorians won the war, they shifted the planet's capital from Keldabe to the city of Sundari, their center of influence.
